description: Shows the importance of water in man's existence in all parts of the world, including Africa, India and Asia. Covers social issues such as water pollution, lack of water for human consumption in the dry arid areas and the need for developing international cooperation in relation to water usage and conservation of this natural resource. Suitable for secondary level.
